backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, permission checks, history storage, and prediction logic with trend and streak analysis.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading fallback before React initializes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring history, prediction, connection state, and UI panels into the dashboard layout.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that shows a user-friendly fallback UI and reload option when rendering fails.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Empty placeholder for the login button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Empty placeholder for the profile setup dialog component.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCallerUser: Empty placeholder for the caller user profile hook.
frontend/src/features/disclaimer/Disclai: Displays a warning card explaining that predictions are heuristic and not guaranteed.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryCon: UI controls for adding Big/Small entries, clearing history, triggering predictions, and handling connection states.
frontend/src/features/history/historyTyp: Defines Big/Small result types with helpers for validation and normalization.
frontend/src/features/history/useGatedHi: Implements a gated state machine allowing one history add after Next when count is 20, using a token to prevent double taps.
frontend/src/features/history/useLocalHi: Manages local history with add, remove, clear, and set functions, capped at 20 entries.
frontend/src/features/history/useRemoteH: Empty placeholder file for remote history logic.
frontend/src/features/prediction/predict: Automated DOM-based script to validate prediction flow by clicking UI elements and checking results or errors.
frontend/src/features/prediction/Predict: UI panel showing prediction status, loading, errors, and connection states with retry options.
frontend/src/features/prediction/useActo: Tracks actor connection readiness, provides connection state flags, and exposes a retry function.
frontend/src/features/prediction/usePred: Handles prediction generation, error categorization, retries, and tracks prediction state tied to actor readiness.
frontend/src/features/results/ResultsPan: Displays latest prediction and two-row compact history visualization with timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on identity, handling initialization and query invalidation on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data, running predictions, and checking actor readiness.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, utilities, and a loading fallback screen.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, containers, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project requirements, issues, and state for a Big/Small prediction app with a rolling 20-item history.
